body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Excellence customer support. My name is Christian Gonzalez. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sarah. How can I assist you today? Could I please have your phone number for identification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five - two three four - zero one zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sarah. And may I also have your address, including the postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, postcode one zero zero two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the details, Sarah. I will look into the billing issue related to your recent visit. Let's get this sorted out for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate your help, Christian. I've been feeling sad about the situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Sarah. Your satisfaction is our priority. Thank you for your patience. We will reach out to you shortly with a resolution. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Christian. I look forward to hearing from you. Goodbye.
